sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Typography } from '@material-ui/core' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button' import makeStyles from '../styles/HomePage' import AddIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Add' import IconButton from '@material-ui/core/IconButton' import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import CreateList from './CreateList' import fetchLists from '../actions/actions' const HomePage = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [userName, setUsername] = useState("Justin") const lists = useSelector((state) => state.state) const [newListName, setNewListName] = useState() const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) const styles = makeStyles() const handleClickOpen = () => { setOpen(true) } const handleClose = (list_name) =>{ setOpen(false) setNewListName(list_name) } useEffect(() => { console.log("From Homepage: " + lists) }) return ( Hi {userName} {/*This is the PopUp menu*/} Shared List
) } export default HomePage
